text:

name: thedailybeast
text:
EXCLUSIVE: An ICE prison guard in Virginia knelt dangerously on the upper back of a man already bleeding from his head in a July 13 incident, according to two eyewitnesses. 

The man, Carlos Rivas Monsano, hasn’t been seen since.
https://t.co/iHSsebdBfF

name: thedailybeast
text:
“It was like seeing George Floyd all over again,” one detainee told The Daily Beast.

ICE said it was investigating what is said to have happened to Rivas. https://t.co/iHSsebdBfF

name: thedailybeast
text:
Detainees’ accounts describe Rivas being initially disciplined for yelling “No” at orders from an officer. 

A lieutenant approached to handcuff Rivas, who refused to stand. 

The lieutenant then proceeded to throw Rivas to the floor and punch him. https://t.co/3nZESCxpIX

name: thedailybeast
text:
One witness said the lieutenant “was on top of [Rivas] like the police officer was on top of George Floyd. His knee is on Carlos’ spinal cord.” 

Horrified Block TE residents screamed for the guards to let Rivas go and get him help. https://t.co/3nZESCxpIX

name: thedailybeast
text: Read the rest of the chilling account by @attackerman here: https://t.co/3nZESCxpIX
